Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Foster/Laramie
ShortDescription: Eastbound 92Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Jefferson Park, Milwaukee, Central, Bryn Mawr, Elston and Foster: near Foster/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Jefferson Park, Milwaukee, Central, Bryn Mawr, Elston, Foster and over regular route, due to street blockage near Foster/Laramie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick employee at Sheridan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick employee at Sheridan.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
